    SignatureValidator
    General purpose functional interface to verify signatures.
    Built in validators: SignatureValidator.PASS: will always report true SignatureValidator.FAIL: will always report false SignatureValidator.YGGDRASIL: Uses SHA1 with RSA and Yggdrasil Public Key for verifying signatures SignatureValidator.from(Player): Uses SHA256 with RSA and the Player's PlayerPublicKey.publicKey() SignatureValidator.from(PublicKey, KeyUtils.SignatureAlgorithm): General purpose factory method
